text: The Tesla Model S is a full-sized / mid-size luxury all-electric five-door liftback car, produced by Tesla, Inc., and introduced on June 22, 2012.[10] The EPA official range for the 2017 Model S 100D,[11] which is equipped with a 100 kWh (360 MJ) battery pack, is 335 miles (539 km),[12] higher than any other electric car.
